recipe_name: Fig fritters with vanilla ice cream
author: James Martin
method: Make the batter by sieving the plain flour and cornflour together into a large bowl. Whisk in enough fizzy cold water to make a batter the consistency of double cream. Heat the oil in a deep heavy-bottomed pan. It is ready when a breadcrumb that is dropped in will sizzle gently in it. (CAUTION: hot oil can be dangerous. Do not leave unattended.) Dip each fig into the batter, then carefully place into the hot oil. Deep fry for 2-3 minutes until crisp and golden brown. Remove using a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen towel. Serve at once with scoops of vanilla ice cream.
ingredients: 2 tbsp plain flour,  2 tbsp cornflour,  fizzy cold water,  vegetable oil, for frying,  8 figs,  vanilla ice cream, to serve
